{"id":1454844795,"question_id":3643,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1731812499,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1454844795/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zero Array Transformation II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    template<class T>\n    T firstTrue(T l, T r, function<bool(T)> f) {\n        r++;\n        while (l < r) {\n            T mid = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            if (f(mid)) r = mid;\n            else l = mid + 1;\n        }\n        return l;\n    }\n\n    int minZeroArray(vector<int>& nums, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        int M = (int)queries.size();\n\n        function<bool(int)> ok = [&](int k) {\n            vector<int> diff(N+1, 0);\n            for (int i=0; i<k; i++) {\n                diff[queries[i][0]] -= queries[i][2];\n                diff[queries[i][1]+1] += queries[i][2];\n            }\n\n            vector<int> A(N, 0);\n            A[0] = diff[0];\n            for (int i=1; i<N; i++)\n                A[i] = diff[i] + A[i-1];\n\n            bool ans = true;\n            for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n                ans &= ((A[i] + nums[i]) <= 0);\n            return ans;\n        };\n\n        int ans = firstTrue(0, M-1, ok);\n        return (ans == M ? -1 : ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zero-array-transformation-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
